text: anal avarkal (ippotanaiyaip) purakkanittarkal; akave, al arim (ennum perum anaiyai utaikkum) katum piravakattai avarkal mitu anuppinom, innum (cuvai mikka kanikalaik konta) avarkalutaiya iru toppukalai kacappum pulippumulla palankalutaiya marankalum, cila ilantai marankalum utaiya iru tottankalaka marrinom
